skynail.service

Class PathService

  • java.lang.Object
    • skynail.service.PathService

  • public class PathService
extends Object
    Service for finding available legal moves and generating paths.
    Author:
    lmantyla

        Creates new PathService.

    • Method Detail

      • getLegalMoves

        public Map<Point,Integer> getLegalMoves()

      • setLegalMoves

        public void setLegalMoves(Map<Point,Integer> legalMoves)

      • calculateLegalMoves

        public Map<Point,Integer> calculateLegalMoves(int moves)
        Makes a list of legal moves a team can make on the map.
        Parameters:
        moves - Number of moves available this turn.
        Returns:
        Map of legal moves and the amount of moves needed to reach them.

      • handleReachedPoint

        public List<Point> handleReachedPoint(Point reachablePoint,
                                      int distance)
        Determines what to do with points that have already been reached once.

        If a reachable point has a higher distance than is currently examined, examining it is delayed until the loop's distance catches up. Therefore the original point is returned to be added to the buffer of points to be examined.

        Parameters:
        reachablePoint - point that has been reached
        distance - distance from the player's position that the calculation has reached.
        Returns:
        list of points linked to the point, only when distance is correct.

      • getNewReachablePoints

        public List<Point> getNewReachablePoints(Point reachablePoint,
                                         int moves,
                                         int distance)
        Checks if a point reached by the search is a legal move.
        Parameters:
        reachablePoint - point being examined
        moves - number of moves this turn
        distance - distance of the point from current position
        Returns:
        either empty list or the points linked to reachablePoint

      • getMovementPath

        public List<Point> getMovementPath(Point reachablePoint)
        Produces a path between the player and a selected legal move; the method works backwards towards the current position of the team.
        Parameters:
        reachablePoint - Point the player wants to reach.
        Returns:
        list of points leading to the current point.

      • getPartialMovementPath

        public List<Point> getPartialMovementPath(Point targetPoint,
                                          int moves)
        Produces a path between player and target that goes as far as moves allow.
        Parameters:
        targetPoint - Point the player wants to reach.
        moves - number of moves the player may take.
        Returns:
        list of points leading to the current point.
